title: Best small Sissor you'll ever Need
body: Bulid Quality is excellent its very usefull for cutting milk packet any paper/plastic covers etc, just use once and you'll never go back to so called (just ₹10 or ₹20) cheaper sissors ever.

title: 'Excellent product'
body: In the few days of use, I'm really impressed. Comfortable grip, ideal size very sharp. Got to see how it performs as it gets older

title: 'Overpriced'
body: 'Using Cartini since forever. Quality has seriously gone done scissors giving an uncomfortable feeling not buttery smooth. Finish not good. Colour is horrible. Black should not be allowed in house had to buy as mine one cannot be found. What a waste. Update : this product is of so low quality that this can be a fake. Local 40 scissors are much better look make and quality than this one. Now tgis has become a liability. Not buying this brand again.'
